Tt Eureka(尤利卡)可以说是鲨鱼机箱的替代型产品,它主要定位于高端DIY用户以及家庭个人服务器方面。Tt尤利卡有银色和黑色两款,工艺上全为铝合金材质,银色的高贵大方.

尤里卡围桩事件 （ Eureka Stockade ）是淘金者反对政府压迫的正义战争，它本身就代表了澳大利亚人抵制权威的传统。桩寨桩寨?  …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Greek heurēka 'I have found it' (from heuriskein 'find'), said to have been uttered by Archimedes when he hit upon a method of determining the purity of gold. The noun dates from the early 20th cent 据传，阿基米德在洗澡时发现浮力原理，高兴得来不及穿上裤子，跑到街上大喊：“Eureka(我找到了)！"

entry.tran: （因突然找到某物或解决问题的方法而欢呼）我找到了，我发现了，有了
entry.def: Someone might say 'eureka' when they suddenly find or realize something, or when they solve a problem.

means.word_mean: 1. a copper-nickel alloy with high electrical resistance and a low temperature coefficient; used as resistance wire
2. a town in northwest California on an arm of the Pacific Ocean
